title: SPY x FAMILY
overview: World peace is at stake and secret agent Twilight must undergo his most difficult mission yetâ€”pretend to be a family man. Posing as a loving husband and father, he'll infiltrate an elite school to get close to a high-profile politician. He has the perfect cover, except his wife's a deadly assassin and neither knows each other's identity. But someone does: his adopted daughter, who's a telepath!
